cr_des: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to C programming. Learn the basics of syntax, functions, and memory management.
Master data structures and algorithms with C++. This course focuses on practical implementations and optimization techniques.
Learn the principles of Object-Oriented Programming using Python. This course covers classes, inheritance, and polymorphism.
Get started with Amazon Web Services (AWS). Learn about the core services, including EC2, S3, and RDS, to build scalable applications.
Understand the basics of cloud computing, including architecture, deployment models, and service models. Explore different cloud platforms.
Enhance your Python skills with advanced concepts such as decorators, generators, and multithreading. Suitable for experienced developers.
Dive into machine learning using Python. This course covers algorithms, libraries, and practical applications of machine learning.
Learn the essentials of DevOps practices. This course covers continuous integration, continuous deployment, and infrastructure as code.
Begin your journey into data science with this introductory course. Learn about data analysis, visualization, and statistical modeling.
